choices: They go camping like Misery wants.
They take Roxy on a cruise.
Amanda takes them to a tropical resort.
A day at the water park first!
They look through more tour guide books.
1.content:
Misery and Roxy had met Amanda about a month ago. After a chaotic introduction the three girls had decided they needed a vacation. Sitting in a booth at a local restaurant they considered their options. Thanks to Amanda, money wasn't a problem and she wanted to show her new friends a great time. Of course that didn't stop her from still wearing the second version of her shrink ray, a wrist band that could alter her size, or anyone else's. If anything that would just add to the fun of their vacation.

"So, where are we going to go?" Amanda questioned the girls who were looking through travel guides spread out upon the table.

Roxy, who was sitting next to Misery, shoved her friend over towards the window and grabbed at a book she was holding onto, "This sounds interesting! I've never been on a cruise before!"

Grumbling Misery pushed back and let Roxy keep the book that she was now staring at wide eyed, "You haven't been out of the state Roxy!"

Amanda grinned up from her big round rimmed glasses, her short cropped blond hair glowing in the early morning sunlight, "Now now girls, don't fight. Whatever we decide I'm sure it will be wonderful. I've got a few more options here. A camping trip, a tropical resort, even a day at the water park if we want to take it easy and leave tomorrow instead."

"I'm all for camping," Misery replied, "At least then I won't be fully in the sun all week."

"Is that a goth thing?" Roxy immediately chimed in.

Misery sighed, “No Roxy, I just don't like being in the sun all the time. I'm not even really goth, I just wear dark clothes a lot. Sheesh.”

Amanda's eyes dart to Roxy's, “She didn't get much sleep again last night?”

“Does she ever?” Roxy replied receiving another playful shove from Misery.

“So ladies, what's it going to be?” Amanda questioned as she leaned forward, her glasses gleaming in the sunlight.
1.title: Amanda's Vacation Ideas

choices: Party cabin where some punk girls are listening to music out front.
Sporty cabin where some althletic girls are getting ready for a game.
Nerdy cabin where a bunch of shy girls are standing around quietly.
Explorers cabin where the girls are getting ready for an outing.
They decide to stay with Natalie in the counselors cabin.
11.content:
"Alright Miz, I guess you've had the most stressful time this month. We'll go with your idea and go camping," Roxy decided putting her book down on the table.

Amanda was slightly taken back by Roxy's idea that Misery was the one having a bad month but she kept her words to herself writing off the comment as a social science she could study through Roxy's actions later, "Camping it is then. I know just the place."

With that the girls were off in Roxy's parents beat up old station wagon that afternoon. They took only what they needed and it just so happened the camp Amanda had in mind was starting that day. The camping grounds were pretty open and relaxed, giving everyone a chance to do what they pleased instead of constant planned events.

The camp however was on that the girls would be sharing a cabin with others. This intrigued Amanda, making her eager to see what the new girls would do when they found some of the shrunken people she still had stored away. Never mind what they'd do when they too became shrunk if Amanda so chose.

In a few hours they pulled up on the worn old sign of, “Camp Natalie” that stretched across the dirt roadway. Misery had turned back to Amanda in the back seat who was playing with a shrunken football player in her hands. She asked why the camp was called Natalie.

“It's the name of the lady who runs it. Camp Natalie is an all girls camp for those around our age,” Explained the scientist, not looking up from the tiny man in her grasp.

Roxy looked up into the rear view mirror, “It's a camp for bitter high school drop outs like us?”

“Like you Roxy,” Amanda corrected, “I graduated with honors years ago.”

Neither girl in the front seat said more as they pulled up on the main circle of cabins surrounding a small garden with a flag pole in the center. Amanda was out of the car almost instantly running up to a very tall girl with long white hair that almost had a blue highlight to it.

They embraced tightly and the blue haired girl in a camp shirt and shorts stamped down to the car in her high heeled sandals.

“Roxy, Misery, this is Natalie!” Amanda was grinning broader than they'd seen her before. It was nice to see the frustrated scientist happy for a change.

“Hello you two, it's a pleasure to meet you!” Natalie offered in an excited tone that made Misery feel even more exhausted then she usually did. “You can pick any cabin you like. They all have their own theme and unique set of campers. We have three openings in each one, so feel free to choose whatever you like!”

Amanda turned to Misery, “Well, this vacation was your idea. Where are we bunking?”
11.title: What Cabin To Stay In...

choices: Find out what Amanda gets up to when the girls leave.
Misery takes Amanda's lunch bag to the volley ball game.
They all go in to discuss another game.
112.content:
Roxy wanders up to the sporty cabin where one girl is bumping a volley ball out front. She instantly looks up and introduces herself in an excited Australian accent, "Hi! I'm Tara, and these are my mates Shelly and Phoebe."

Tara herself was about Roxy's height with chestnut hair that fell straight down her back. Phoebe was a bit shorter with spikey blond hair and a light dusting of freckles on her cheeks. Shelly's hair was short cropped and black, shining in the bars of sunlight from the emerald canopy of leaves high above.

"If you're done sizing us up, maybe you're in for a game?" Phoebe asked, grabbing the ball away from under Tara's arm.

Amanda wandered past the girls and into the cabin calling back, "If you two want any of the 'small candies' I brought with me to take along with you, they're in my nylon lunch bag. I'm going to catch a nap before noon."

Having wandered up to the three sporty girls Misery stood beside Roxy as Tara asked. "So how about it mate? Up for some two on three? We'll even let you take Shelly for your team."
112.title: Sporty cabin where some althletic girls are get...

choices: Befriend Jill the gamer girl.
Befriend Rachel the sweet homesick girl.
Befriend Lauren the slightly less shy sci-fi and fantasy fan.
113.content:
Misery didn't want to be bothered as much as she could help, so she stomped right up to the nerd girls cabin. A girl with long brown hair and small rimmed glasses peeked up at her from a hand held video game and looked right back down. Not sure if it was concentration or shyness Misery offered the first hello.

“Hi! I'm Misery and these are my friends Roxy and Amanda. We'll be bunking up with you,” she offered, stamping a booted foot down on the front step of the cabin next to the girl.

A red head from a nearby open window perked up and smiled to them, “Don't mind Jill, she doesn't talk much. I'm Lauren and Rachel is back in her somewhere. Probably reading her moms notes from home.”

“Stop making fun of me!” A voice called from the back of the cabin.

Lauren looked back, “If I was making fun of you I'd tell them about your stuffed animal collection that you've taken up your top bunk with! You're the oldest out of all of us!”

“They always argue like this. My parents say it's good for me to get out and meet new people though. I'll introduce myself when I'm done my game,” Jill softly spoke, not looking up from her hand held.

Roxy's hand clapped down on Misery's shoulder, “Good choice! At least these three should be in bed by nine every night.”

Grinning Amanda pushed her way passed Misery and Amanda, almost stepping on Jill's game case next to her, she trod up the stairs into the cabin, “This should prove very interesting indeed. Now, who to be close friends with.”
113.title: Quiet Nerdy Girls

choices: "Do you think that I could see him for a second?"
"So what exactly are you going to do with him?"
"I don't believe you... I want to see some proof..."
1131.content:
Amanda decided to try and become friends with Jill. She didn't know exactly what it was, but there was something about that shy girl that intrigued her. Amanda walked up behind Jill and proceeded to watch her game from over her shoulder. It was a typical platformer game, very similar to Mario games in overall appearance. Jill was focused on her game intensely, and it seemed as though she didn't even notice that Amanda was watching over her shoulder. After a few more minutes, Jill finally finished getting through the level she was on in her game. Saving the game and shutting it off, she slowly turned around to look at Amanda.

"Why were you watching over my shoulder?" Jill asked in a calm voice.

"Well, ummm... I was just curious about what kind of game you were playing" Amanda responded, somewhat surprised that Jill had noticed her.

"Oh, well, it's nothing special. Just a normal game that I play every now and then. I'm still waiting for the sequel to come out, so I've been playing this one over again in the mean time." Jill replied, sounding somewhat bored.

"Hmmm... That sounds like fun and all, but how would you like it if I showed you something even more entertaining than some outdated videogame?"

Jill simply sighed and put her handheld away.

"Well, technically it isn't outdated until the sequel is actually released, but whatever... I'm actually getting pretty bored playing through the same game for the 5th time, so what do you want to show me?" Jill said, beginning to sound a bit curious near the end.

Amanda just smiled at her new friend and reached down into her bag. Moments later, she pulled out a shrunken boy from her school's football team. Jill only stared at the tiny boy with a very curious expression on her face, clearly baffled by the sight of this 3 inch tall football player.

"Is he real?" Jill asked, sounding surprisingly calm despite what she was looking at.

"Yep! I shrunk this little sucker myself!" Amanda answered excitedly. She couldn't wait to see how the shy gamer girl would react to this.

Again, Jill simply stared at the tiny boy for almost a full minute before responding:
1131.title: Befriending the Game Girl

choices: She spits him out onto the wooden steps of the cabin.
Jill closes her eyes and enjoys gulping him down.
11311.content:
Jill looked up at Amanda and calmly asked, "Do you think that I could see him for a second?"

"Sure! Just be careful they are quite fragile," Amanda warned as she handed over the tiny football player. She was much more interested in seeing what Jill had in mind rather than the tiny guys safety.

However it even shocked Amanda to see what happened next. The tiny guy was dropped down into this girls soft padded palms, staring up at her inquisitive eyes gleaming through her small rimmed glasses. Then suddenly he found himself licked up by her massive tongue into her giant mouth without a second though.

Stunned and speechless Amanda took a slightly hunched over startled pose and just stared at Jill as she began working the shrunken football player around in her mouth with her tongue.

“Yeah she does that,” Lauren explained from the window, having watched the whole situation play out. “I hope you're kidding around, cause she tends to eat whatever goes in there. After she's done playing around with it first.”

A slow grin spread over Amanda's face. She expected this of a toy or something, sure. If the girl had some oral fixation, no big deal. But this was a shrunken living person that this girl just popped into her mouth like candy! She wasn't even playing attention. Jill was just leaning back on her hands and staring up at the canopy of leaves above the cabin while she worked the tiny guy around with her tongue.

Meanwhile inside the shy girls mouth, the tiny guy was desperately trying to cling to her slippery tongue and finding no success. He tried to keep away from her teeth but she didn't seem interested in using them to bite into him, yet. They were tightly closed and he only occasionally thumped into them. Otherwise he was forced forward and to the roof of her mouth, being licked again and again.

Misery and Roxy wandered up behind Amanda with curious expressions.

“So she does this often?” Misery inquired, watching the girls cheeks as saliva must be being forced between her teeth to make them slightly buldge.

Lauren laughed and replied, “Yup! We've made sure to keep anything small away from her. Usually she just licks things but occasionally if she puts it in her mouth it's usually gone.”

Roxy couldn't blame her. She knew the rush of feeling a tiny squirming in her mouth, struggling against her tongue. Jill's aimless focused expression as she stared towards the sky made perfect sense for how much attention it takes to play around with one of them.

With the initial shock fading, Amanda started to look around concerned. The situation hadn't caused anyone else to come over and see what was going on. Even quiet Rachel was still somewhere in the back of the cabin. That was a relief. She didn't want to start mass hysteria. Things could be much more fun on a personal basis, introducing each girl to these shrunken people to see their reactions.

Now the question was, what would Jill do when she got bored of his weak struggles?
11311.title: Jill Pops The Shrunken Guy Into Her Mouth

choices: Lauren places her foot on him and slowly plays with him.
The tiny football player manages to pull himself under the stairs.
113111.content:
With a frustrated expression Jill swirls the tiny football player around in her mouth a few more times and leans over to her right. Amanda watches wide eyed as she spits the tiny man down hard on the worn wooden steps of the cabin.

A sharp crack sounds as his tiny body hits the step with quite a bit of force. From his perspective he looks up to see the calm expression of the girl who tried to eat him and Misery, Roxy and Amanda gathered around on the other sides. Tired and weakened by the experience he struggles to sit up but finds his body just won't cooperate. Helpless to do anything he lays back, watching the girls and hoping one will do something for him.

“Broken,” Jill said softly, “Lauren, come down here and step on this will you? He's hurt.”

The tiny guys breath rushed as his heart began beating quickly in fear. He couldn't believe what he just heard. Didn't this girl realize he was a real person? Trying desperately to roll over he started clawing at the grain of the wood, struggling to pull himself towards the open gap under the next step so he could fall to freedom away from this crazy girls!

Instantly eager for feedback Amanda looked up to Lauren, “You wouldn't want to do that would you?”

She came over from the window to the doorway and shrugged. Amanda's eyes darted down to see Lauren's bare feet that looked pretty dirty from wandering around the cabin and woods. Considering the tiny football player was now trying to pull himself free from a small puddle of saliva it was going to be messy to have her step on him.

Jill slid over so Lauren could walk down the stairs next to her. She looked up expectantly at her friend, squinting in the sunlight and pushing her glasses back up again.

Amanda leaned back to her friends, “Wow, I thought you were cruel Misery but this girl is just careless.”

“She's an amateur. When you don't know what they are it's easy to do this stuff. Give her a few more and we'll see how cool she is,” Misery whispered back, “And we're not going to be playing with these all camping trip are we? I'll dump the bag out here and squish 'em all if you want.”

“That won't be necessary. I'm just having some fun,” Amanda grinned at Misery, “Thanks for the offer though. I'm glad to see you're still feeling good about all this.”

Lauren wiggled her toes, drumming them against the wooden planks of the top step, “So is everyone okay with this guy going smush under my big dirty feet?”

The gamer girl simply looked down at him through her small rimmed glasses and said, “Yeah, I don't want to eat him and he's obviously hurt. Just have some fun with it, it's kinda neat how he fights against you.”
113111.title: Spat Out By Jill The Gamer Girl

choices: Jill goes behind the cabin to see how someone can be shrunk.
Misery shrinks the nerdy girls and takes over the cabin.
11313.content:
Jill asking to see some proof gave Amanda an idea, "Misery, I want you to come over and meet a new friend."

The purple haired goth girl walked up beside Amanda and asked what was up.

"It seems Jilly here doesn't believe this tiny guy is a real shrunken person. I thought maybe you might want to give her some proof," Amanda explained looking back into Misery's eyes and giving her a knowing stare.

Reaching into her deep pocket of her cargo pants, Misery fumbled for the size remote and grinned, "Why don't we go over in behind the cabin Jill and I'll show you just how it works?"

Jill raised an eyebrow and started fumbling with her game again, "I don't think I'm interested."

"Sure you are!" Misery began, "Think about it, what if this is true? You really want to miss out on something that cool?"

"It's not really that cool," Jill said coldly, "You've got some sort of toy. I'm not impressed."

This was starting to frusterate both Amanda and Misery. They didn't want to shrink anyone right out in front of the cabin. Lauren for one would have completely lost it the moment Jill dwindled away and that other girl back in the cabin would surely freak out too. Then again on the other hand there was nothing saying they couldn't just shrink them all and take over the cabin.

"Hey Roxy, get over here," Misery called her friend over. The punk girl wandered to Misery's side and looked expectantly at her friend.

Roxy smiled and looked at Mis, "I'm up for anything you are," knowing what was going on in her friends head.

"Look, how about you come around the cabin and I'll show you how all this works. If it doesn't work then hey, I'm silly, we all have a good laugh and we admit it's a toy," Misery explained to Jill who seemed slightly more curious and had ignored her game again.

Amanda sat down next to Jill and put her arm around her, "You know you're curious," she brought the football player up close to Jill's huge face, "Doesn't he look so real?"

Jill couldn't deny it, the guy did look pretty convincing. Still she didn't want to be bothered by these new girls really, but maybe she should just humor them to break the ice.
11313.title: Jill doesn't believe in shrunken people.

choices: Carol, the small blue haired cheerleader.
Bill, one of the school football players.
Kelly, an agressive bigger girl from the baseball team.
1132.content:
Amanda's spongy blue sandals clapped across the old wooden floorboards of the cabin as she approached the shadowy figure near the back. Rachel was actually still in her bunk, and was indeed reading letters presumably from home. A glance up to the top bunk revealed a mountain of stuffed animals and Rachel herself was sitting on a blanket covered in a teddy bear pattern.

"This girl's older than I am?" Amanda questioned to herself as she walked over, "I guess theres nothing wrong with that. I've probably got some stuff back home. I see why she stands out to Lauren though.

Lauren herself had gone out front to meet up with Roxy. Misery had already sat down next to Jill on the front steps, intently trying to figure out what she was playing on her hand held.

Rachel herself had small rimmed glasses and her black hair tied back into a pony tail. She hid behind a row of bangs that hung almost over her eyes.

"What do you want?" Rachel said flatly, glaring up from her letter.

Amanda glided over and sat down softly on the bed... which creaked and groaned showing the age of the springs that barely held it together. Her dramatic entrance gone, Amanda still smiled sweetly to Rachel and said, "I'd like to be your friend. I know what it's like to miss your parents."

Rachel raised an eyebrow and tucked her letter into an evelope and then into the nightstand drawer beside her bed. "Really? You just got here!"

"My... Parents arn't around anymore," Amanda began.

In response Rachel blinked, her bangs being tugged gently by her long eyelashes, "Oh I'm sorry! I didn't mean to..."

Putting up her hands, Amanda calmed the girl, "You didn't know. Now, you're having problems here arn't you? I'd say you've probably always had problems with girls like Lauren."

Clenching her fists against the blanket, Rachel tugged up two handfulls of it.

Amanda slid closer and put her arm around her, "How would you like to get back at someone like Lauren?"

Rachel looked surprised at first and hugged her knees to her chest but slowly her eyes went from staring at the dusty floorboards to finally looking back up to Amanda.

"What would I do?" She asked softly.

Amanda reaches into her lunch bag and pulls out...
1132.title: Befriend Rachel the sweet homesick girl.

choices: Amanda dumps him out into Rachel's hand.
Amanda purposefully drops him to the floor at Rachel's feet.
11322.content:
Bill was in darkness, just with the hint of light from the glowing blue and yellow walls around him from the sunlight outside his lunch bag prison. He wasn't prepared for the blinding light when Amanda unzipped and opened the bag high above. She stared down through her huge glasses, blue eyes scanning for someone specific.

He held his breath when those giant eyes locked onto him and were replaced by the huge fingers of the scientist girl. All the others in the bag moved back away from the grasping hand, leaving poor shocked Bill there to be snatched up into Amanda's grasp.

Held within her soft grasp, tightly into the spongy warm flesh of her palm by her arching fingers, Bill awaited his fate. Outside he heard Amanda muffled voice talking, "I bet you've put up with a lot from all those jocks at school before. How would you like to get back at one of them?"

A secondary voice, also female replied much softer, "Oh, I don't know if I could hurt someone. You didn't bring anything dangerous to camp did you?"

That was when the fingers around him opened simultaneously. Amanda's grasp released and Bill found himself sitting in the palm of the blond girls hand staring up into the titanic face of a very surprised girl. The bangs of her tied back black hair created slashes of shadow over her round cheeks and small rimmed glasses. Looking down over the gap between two of Amanda's fingers he saw the girls slender body stretching out far below. She seemed to be wearing a tee shirt from some camp and a pair of short black shorts.

He fell back again and looked up at the two looming faces staring down at him.

“Is he real?” The other girl gasped in surprise, looking up to meet Amanda's gaze.

Grinning, the giant blond nodded, “He sure is. Why don't you take him Rachel?”

Amanda's hand reached up to Rachel and...
11322.title: Football player in Amanda's hand

choices: Rachel decides to squish Bill with her feet.
Bill manages to crawl under the bed while Amanda tries to convince Rachel.
113222.content:
The sense of gravity is overwhelming when suddenly Bill's world went from staring up at Rachel's wondering face to free falling down towards the ground. It took him awhile to figure out exactly what was happening, even after he hit the ground with a tiny thud to the two girls many times his size.

"Aww, I'm sorry Bill. I see to have... accidentally dropped you," Amanda smiled down at the football player. She really didn't care. He was always a jerk to her. Constantly yelling at her outside of school and in the hallways. It didn't help that Amanda tended to wear her lab coat at school even on summer days, but it still encouraged her even more to add him to her shrunken collection.

Rachel was stunned and leaned right over, looking down at the tiny guy between her feet with dark blue painted toenails. Her wide eyes stared down at the tiny form that lay there, softly panting from his injuries.

He wasn't too sure what all was wrong with him, but he knew his legs wern't working right and the rest of his body was jarred painfully. The fall hadn't killed him, presumably because his tiny size put less force on his body. Either way he didn't know what to do as the massive toes just a few yards away wiggled against the old hard wood floor. Beyond that, he saw the underside of Rachel's bunk bed. It's inviting shadows could be a wonderful place for him to try to escape if we could crawl there.

Amanda high above was encouraging Rachel about what she should do though, sparing only occasional glances down to Bill to make sure he wasn't trying to escape. "He looks really hurt Rachel, you should probably just put him out of his misery."

“Me!” Rachel shrieked, “You did this to him. I don't even know what he is.”

“He's a football player from school, shrunken down. Simple as that. No one knows where he is and now he's broken beyond help. You're the one with the pent up anger, why not take it out on him? He's always treated girls like us badly,” Amanda explained.

Rachel brought her huge feet up on their tip toes, almost pulling them under the bed as if she was afraid for them to be near the tiny man, “Still, he's a person.”

“And a person in terrible pain. Would you rather leave him there? Any number of things could come along and eat him up! That would be even worse than just simply being stepped on by your cute feet,” The blond scientist continued to encourage as she leaned over and stared down at Bill with a smile.

Knowing exactly what Amanda was doing, Bill frantically tried to claw at the floor. He hoped he could pull himself to freedom under the bed before this nerdy girl make up her mind to plop one of those giant feet down on top of him. It was some kind of game to Amanda and he'd been there when Misery's apartment was littered with a bunch of his classmates. Fortunately he was grabbed up and put in a jar by the flustered goth girl but shortly after that he found himself captured by Roxy when she came to visit and now here, picked up by Amanda again.

With a slight blush Rachel was actually beginning to wonder if it would be so bad. Her feet had just been resting in bed all morning and they weren't even damp with sweat. It would be a simple thing to do. She didn't mind the idea, and Amanda was right, he was hurt badly.
113222.title: Bill is dropped at Rachel's feet

choices: Rachel quickly splats Bill with a quick step.
Rachel tries to position her foot and it's a slow process.
1132221.content:
Bill only managed to turn over on his back before the sweet blushing Rachel high above adjusted her glasses and hugged a nearby teddy bear tightly to her chest with both arms, “I'm sorry little guy but I probably should do this.”

Smiling off to the side, Amanda glanced at Rachel and then quickly back to Bill, “Yeah, it's for the best. I'm glad you're not letting me do it. I get kind of wrapped up and play with them too much with my toes. It really ends up hurting them more. I dunno, maybe I'm shy and I just can't do it right away when I get my feet on them,” Amanda lied.

Gulping, Rachel hoped that she wondered if she'd have the same problem once his tiny hands were touching the sole of her foot. Really she felt like doing this just because Amanda was the only one on this trip that had treated her this nicely. The camp councilor didn't pay much attention to her and besides from Jill sharing her snacks while she gamed the late night away, camp had been boring.

Slowly, Rachel's right foot crept forward away from the bed and rested flat on the floor near Bill. He looked over and hoped that her massive foot would land upon him near her arch, which seemed big enough for him to at least squeeze under. He doubted it though as her foot pivoted up on it's heel and the wide ball of her foot hovered over him.

Knowing there was no hope of escape now, Bill looked up to Amanda and then frowned. He'd never seen the nerdy science girl looking so happy. She was eager for him to get crushed by this complete stranger he'd been staring into the face of only moments ago.

“What if this doesn't finish him off?” Rachel suddenly asked, her toes bending upward and smoothing out her sole high over Bill.

Amanda put an arm around her new friend, “Don't worry Rachel, it will! You just gotta make sure to position the ball of your foot right on top of him and when you've got him good and pinned, then you press down really hard and grind him into the floor.”
“Oh! That sounds so mean. Isn't there an easier way to do this?” The quiet girl asked, getting nervous again and hugging her teddy bear tighter.

“I dunno. We could leave him down on the beach, but getting eaten by a seagull would probably be much worse than just being squished. Plus at least it's by someone so nice and sweet like yourself. You're doing it because you care about his suffering,” Amanda continued to encourage.

“Someone cares about my suffering,” Bill said to himself, far too tiny to be heard down on the dusty floor. The toes above him had begun to wiggle absently as Rachel discussed Bill's fate with Amanda. He couldn't help but stare at the giant sole as it wrinkled gently overhead. With each scrunch of her toes, her sole became a plush ceiling of fleshy folds. He hoped that would be what she stepped down on him with, imagining that it wouldn't hurt him at all.

Rachel twisted her foot out of the way to see Bill still laying here, “I'm really sorry about this. I'd have caught you if I could have. I'll do my best to make this as quick as possible.” With that, her foot blocked out the wooden rafters high above again.
1132221.title: Helpless as Rachel raises her foot over Bill

choices: Amanda suggests her idea for shrinking Lauren.
Amanda suggests they wander the camp grounds.
11322211.content:
To Bill's horror, Rachel's toes stretched out and the wide ball of her foot smoothed out. He knew this was going to hurt and he tried to push himself back away from his impending doom.

“I hope this isn't going to feel too gross. I don't even like it when I step on one of Jill's gummy candies. But I guess this is different,” Rachel pondered, mostly to herself it seemed.

Meanwhile under her huge waiting sole, Bill couldn't believe what he was hearing. If anything he was in a lot of pain and in need of help not being squished. He struggled to continue scrambling back out of the way but instead he just seemed to be positioning himself directly under the pad of her foot.

Amanda's hand squeezed Rachel's shoulder tightly as she watched on. It always intrigued her how differently people reacted to these situations and Rachel's quiet apologetic approach was much different than Misery's usual hysteria.

The nerdy girls giant foot stayed still for a moment and then her sole slammed down hard on her target. Rachel's foot landed flatly on him and she felt a slight pop like a grape being crushed under her sole.

She stayed there for a moment, unsure of what to do now. Obviously she'd want to wipe her foot off but on what? Rachel felt awkward, knowing that they couldn't have fixed up the tiny guy but feeling guilty for being so mean to him too. Considering what he must have been watching, she thought to herself that maybe putting her sandals on would have been a better idea.

Regardless it was done and Amanda's eyes were scanning Amanda's face for any signs of what she was feeling. She was eager to ask lots of questions, but wanted to determine exactly what reaction Rachel was experiencing beforehand.

Amanda took it from the fact that Rachel's tight hug on her teddy bear seemed relaxed now that she wasn't panicked. That was a good sign. At least if she wanted Rachel to do more like this. Maybe not here though. After all, they had the whole camp grounds to enjoy toying with Amanda's shrunken captives in, or even making some new ones. That Lauren girl after all seemed to be teasing Rachel quite a bit. Amanda grinned, considering how funny it would look to see a shrunken Lauren dodging the footfalls of Rachel's cute feet stomping amongst the stuffed animals in her top bunk, helpless to escape besides a massive fall to the floor below.

The blond jumped when she realized Rachel was staring right back into her eyes, “Oh! So how was that?”

“I think I need a tissue. Do you think he's squished?” She asked quietly but not really upset by the experience.

Amanda laughed and produced a tissue far too quickly from the side pouch on the lunch bag containing the other people, “Would you consider doing that again?”

This would be the moment to really gage if Rachel was having fun or not, Amanda assumed.

“I don't know. It seemed okay, and he needed us to help him. What do you mean?” The nerdy girl asked in a concerned tone.

Amanda leaned in and whispered her next idea to Rachel.
11322211.title: Bill goes splat under Rachel's bare foot

choices: Rachel is more than happy to play with Lauren!
Rachel is still unsure...so Amanda gives her a hand
113222111.content:
A gleam formed in Amanda's eyes as she eagerly spoke of her plan, "We should shrink Lauren next…You see how mean she is to you. She needs to be put in her place." It took all the self-control Amanda had to stop a demented smile from forming on her face.

The idea alone made Rachel's eyes widen in shock. "S-Shrink Lauren?!"

Amanda quickly placed a finger on Rachel's lips, "Shh! Not too loud!"

"Shrink Lauren?!" Rachel repeated at a much lower volume.

The scientist nodded, "Yeah, admittedly I haven't seen much of her, but it looks like she treats you terribly. I can give you a shot to show her who's the boss around here."

"I can't do that to her! I've known her for so long I can't just…just kill her!"

"You don't have to!" Amanda reassured, "I can just shrink her down and you can just mess around with her. You could lay your foot on top of her, but you don't have to kill her! Just show her how you feel about her."

Rachel averted her eyes, "I don't know…it still seems pretty…mean…"

The blonde scientist laid a hand on her new friend's shoulder, "Trust me, as mean as you could be. It would never come close to how mean she treats you. I mean, I honestly feel sorry for you having to deal with someone like that all the time. Believe me, I know how it feels."

The shy girl looked back into Amanda's eyes, "Y-You do?"

Amanda nodded, "Yeah, they were one of the first people I ever shrunk. Playing with them…it was probably the best day of my life. It made me feel so much better about everything, and they learned their lesson."

"Well…You seem so sure…I guess it can't hurt." Rachel finally gave in with a slight hug to her teddy bear.

Amanda smiled, "Alright! Give me a little bit of time. I'll bring her here!" She quickly headed out the door.

-----

Shrinking down Lauren was incredibly easy. A lot of the girl's in the camp seemed to keep to themselves, or at the very least, keep to their respective cabins. So when Amanda had traversed through half of the camp grounds and found Lauren, she was all alone. For whatever reason Roxy wasn't around…knowing her she probably went to go do something. For whatever reason, it worked out perfectly. With another step Amanda's sandal crushed a twig, Lauren quickly veered around to see the scientist walking towards her.

"Hey! Uh…Amanda right? What're you up to?"

Amanda took another few steps forward, "Nothing much, just looking for you."

"Oh really?" Mild surprise shined in the not-so-shy girl's eyes, "Why? What's up?"

The blonde scientist felt her heart begin to eagerly pound as she instinctively reached a hand for her size-changing wrist band. "It's about Rachel."

The look on Lauren's face died down quite a bit, "Oh…Is she whining again?"

"Actually she wants to try and make things up with you."

Lauren shrugged, "It's not like we're enemies or anything. I just have a little bit of fun with her."

Amanda smiled, "And now it's her turn to have fun with you." In a single swift move, Amanda aimed her wrist band's shrink ray and hit Lauren with it. In mere seconds the girl went wide eyed as the world became hundreds of times bigger in 10-seconds flat. She stopped shrinking at a puny inch tall; having shrunken so fast she was currently in too much shock to fully grasp what had just happened. With something of a demented smile the blonde scientist stomped her blue sandals right in front of Lauren, forcibly bringing her out of her shock, to the sight of five toes about her size. Each toe wiggled eagerly with a desire Amanda had to just crush the shrunken bully.

"I don't like bullies…" She explained, "In fact, I tend to crush them like the bugs that they are." Amanda raised her left foot for emphasis.

In no time at all Lauren fell to her knees, speaking with the shrunken voice that could barely be heard. "Please no! I'm sorry Amanda! Just don't crush me! I swear I'll-" She was cut off by Amanda stomping…

…right in front of her. "I really want to crush you…but I'm not evil. If you prove to me you're not such a bad girl. I may let you live." The demented smile Amanda always got from toying with shrunken people was as apparent on her face as the glasses she had.

"H-How?" Whimpered Lauren.

Amanda wiggled her toes, "Well…I think what bullies really need is some humiliation. So why don't you show me that? I think kissing my toes would be a great way to start."

There was no hesitation in Lauren as she quickly ran to Amanda's people-sized toes and starting kissing each of them. The fear of a death from the scientist's blue sandal was enough to scare away anything that would remotely hinder her humiliating actions. Each toe tasted of a salty mixture of sweat and foot; a taste that, however brief it was, made Lauren wish to gag. Amanda chuckled as yet another tiny submitted to her, like all the others had before her. They all died of course, but it wasn't Amanda's place to kill this one. That was for Rachel.

In another quick movement, Amanda bent over and plucked the small girl from the ground with her fingers. "Not bad…I think I'll let you live…for now." It was hard to tell whether or not Lauren was relieved, not that Amanda even cared. She casually slid the girl into her bag along with all of the other tinies and with nothing left to do, the girl turned around and began heading back to Rachel.

-----

By the time Amanda had gotten back, it had been roughly 30-minutes. Rachel looked as if she never moved from her bed. Her teddy bear now rested beside her on the bed instead of in her arms, but the nerdy girl seemed more focused on her feet. No doubt she was probably envisioning a small Lauren near them, or perhaps even just admiring the fact they had the power to take a life, with hardly even an ounce of effort. Rachel's gaze quickly shifted to Amanda when she returned though, "You're back! Does that mean…?"

"I got you a little present!" Amanda grinned as she reached into her bag. Out with her hand came Lauren, who she laid out on the wooden floor before Rachel's bare feet. The timid girl grew silent as she stared at the tiny bully. Not even an hour ago Lauren was taller than her, now she was shorter than her toes. She had to poke Lauren with a toe to make sure she was real; the small poke was enough to knock the woman over.

"Lauren…?" Rachel asked aloud.

"Y-Yes Rachel?" Lauren responded, clearly fearful by her tone.

"Oh my God…" Rachel cupped her mouth as a gasp escaped. Amanda leaned against the bed Rachel was on, intently watching how the next few minutes would play out. How Rachel would react to Lauren so small.

Once the initial shock settled down Rachel finally began to act. Rachel…
113222111.title: Lauren Downsized

choices: Lauren is picked up and placed on Rachel's top bunk with her stuffed animals.
Rachel releases Lauren and lets her try to get away on the floor.
1132221111.content:
Rachel softly put the ball of her right foot down on top of Lauren and looked down at the tiny girl from between her big and second toe. High above, Rachel's left foot shuffled back on top of the mattress as she hugged her other knee for support and leaned back slightly to make sure tiny Lauren didn't go splat.

“I don't like the things you say to me Lauren,” Rachel softly commented, her foot staying quite still as he toes slowly scrunched over and over. To Lauren this was quite an ordeal on it's own. The plush pad of Rachel's foot expanded with each wiggle of the giant toes over top of her and the massive sole below wrinkled eagerly with the movements.

With tiny shrunken hands, Lauren began pushing slightly up against Rachel's foot. All she could really do was move the blanket of flesh up slightly, and letting it go usually caused it to push down tightly against the shrunken girl.

With a quirky little smile Rachel was starting to feel better about this, “Well, not so smart now are you? Don't you want to make fun of my massive size now? I'm a big mean giant girl and you're a bully who's trapped under my beautiful giant feet.” All this was said very softly.

Amanda noted the wording. She was right, Rachel had been admiring her feet silently. The scientist couldn't complain either. Out of all the girls here she preferred the idea of Rachel stepping on the tiny people. Her feet were slightly plusher than the others and were sure to be soft. Even though they were sure to be sort of sweaty in this heat and on Rachel's bed, they were pretty clean and smooth too. No real harm was coming to Lauren and Amanda was enjoying that. It kept both of the girls focused instead of Lauren needing to worry about any physical pain.

“Please Rachel! I'm just having fun with you. It's not like I was being serious. It's just jokes!” Lauren tried to explain, tears coming to her eyes as she tried to shuffle out between the nerdy girls toes.

Rachel's eyes flashed suddenly in surprise and she squeezed her toes down lightly on Lauren's shoulders, “Don't try to get away now. We're talking.”

“Well talk so you can let me go! I'm sorry!” Lauren pleaded.

Wanting to keep the situation going Amanda leaned in, “I dunno Rachel, I think she'd say anything to get out from under your foot.”

Lauren looked up to Amanda and softly asked, “What should I do then?”

“I don't know. You could always make a game of it. Maybe put Rachel up on your top bunk amongst all your stuffed animals that she made fun of you for and let her hide under them while you try to find her with your feet. Or of course you can just do what you did to Bill and squish her horribly under the giant sole of your bare foot,” detailed description always made Amanda's pulse rush and betrayed how excited she really was avoiding showing.

Of course hearing this Lauren was now struggling like crazy. Hearing that Rachel had already done something so horrible turned this innocent game into a fearful real problem. Her foot had already doomed someone and the nerdy red head wasn't going to take this laying down.

Amanda pulled back, realizing she was squeezing Rachel's shoulder, “So, what do you think? Don't forget how she made you feel. You're in control now. She didn't have to be mean to you, and you don't have to let her get away with it.”

“I thought you said I could just play with her,” Rachel hugged her knee a bit more again, her shy attitude coming back.

The scientist girl gave her twisted grin, “Well that's up to you. I don't know if I can return her to regular size,” Amanda lied, “So if you don't look after her, she just might get stepped on by someone else. If it's gunna happen it may as well be under your cute feet.”

Rachel blushed, unsure of what to do. The idea on her bunk sounded good, but letting Lauren go on the floor and hunting her down sounded like fun too. As long as someone else didn't step on her like Amanda warned about.
1132221111.title: Rachel Is Happy To Play With Lauren At Her Feet

choices: More torture
11322212.content:
Rachel fibbed a little; she wouldn't make this quick AT ALL, she had gotten aroused by the idea of someone being so tiny and at her mercy! It was just a fantastic idea!! And why shouldn't she be free to torture him? She certainly got enough of abuse from these kinds of people.

Bill was on the ground, waiting for Rachel to snuff him out like a bug. The way he saw it, once a bug, always a bug, so life as he knew it was over. He didn't want to, obviously, but he almost wanted Rachel to get it over with fast. Her huge smelly toes were wriggling over him, menacingly.

Rachel sandwiched him between her feet, and then started slamming her feet down on him. She gripped his head between her toes, and started waving her foot around in the air, carrying him with it. Try though he might, no amount of pounding and thrashing around could let him go.
11322212.title: Rachel tries to position her foot and it's ...

choices: Run under the beds and hope to make a break for the door.
Drop free and run out into the cabin in hopes of finding another escape.
113222121.content:
Bill kept pushing against Rachel's toes, hoping to pull himself free. It was no use, all he could do was hold on to the soft flesh between her toes and wait. High above Rachel was actually smiling down at him. She was loving this. He was completely at her mercy and she was too busy enjoying treating him like a helpless tiny he was at her feet.

Finally Rachel's toes let go and Bill fell down on his back on the floor. The sight was frightening. Rachel's toes spread and wiggled above him but high above that the nerdy girl with the black pony tail was smiling down eagerly with her mouth open. She wasn't having fun, she was delighted. Bill knew that she wanted him to be afraid of her toes, she was wiggling them just to intimidate him.

It was obvious now that he was going to have to accept what had happened to him and do something about it. Otherwise he was going to be tormented by this girls giant toes for a long time to come. At least that's what he thought as the gigantic ball of her foot pressed down on his legs and her toes arched down over his head.

He squirmed under Rachel's huge foot, trying to push and struggle free again. He needed to decide what to do when she let off him again. As once again Bill felt himself being scraped across the rough floor and being sandwiched between Rachel's soft soles he decided what he had to do.
113222121.title: More torture

choices: Misery's POV as She Has Her New Slave Tinies Give Her A Foot Rub
Roxy's POV As She Introduces The Tinies to The Bottoms of Her Feet
Amanda's POV as She Tortures Her Tinies in Different Ways
Something Else Happens
Something Else Happens
12.content:
In the end, Misery found herself outvoted by Amanda and Roxy when it came to the cruise, and far too tired to argue, she submitted. Amanda spoke up after they had come to an agreement, "Oh and by the way, the cruise leaves this afternoon"

Silence....

"WHAT!?" Roxy and Misery yelled in unison, causing a waitress to drop a tray full of food nearby, as well as a foul mouthed old lady to spill her tea all over herself and then say, probably louder than she meant to, "Shit!".

Roxy and Misery hid themselves behind menus and continued the conversation. "Amanda, you didn't tell us that! How are we supposed to pack!?" Miz said frantically.

"How are we supposed to get tickets!?" Roxy chimed in.

"Don't worry about it! Here," She passed her house key across the table, "You two mind packing for me while I get the tickets?" She stood up from the table, taking a drink from her soda, burping a little, and was out the door before they could ask anymore questions.

"......Do you think she's lost it?" Roxy turned to Misery with a skeptical look on her face.

Miz shrugged, "She usually knows what she's doing......sometimes."

(Later)

The three girls had just finished packing Amanda's bags when the blonde girl walked into the house. "Oh I get it, I go out on a limb for you guys and you pack my bags last! Hmph, I guess you won't be needing these then!" Amanda glared from behind her glasses as she emptied her pockets onto the coffee table, which of course had been full of tiny victims for their pleasure cruise.

There were at least 12, four for each of them, Misery and Roxy walked over to the table with the confused little people scampering around on it and smiled at their bespectacled friend. "There are also these," She tossed them both what looked like television remotes, "Your own size devices, I've been saving them for a day like this." Amanda smirked as they each took up their four tinies and placed them in their pockets. "Thanks Amanda!" Roxy said.

"Yeah you've really outdone yourself this time!" Miz complimented.

Amanda blushed, "Hee hee, Thanks guys. Now, lets get this show on the road!"

Once the three girls were on deck and had been shown to their rooms, they each decided to spend some "quality time" with their tiny people in private. So, telling each other goodbye for now as the ship set sail, each girl entered their room and locked their door, placing a Do Not Disturb sign on the outside.
12.title: The Cruise of a Lifetime

choices: Either foot torture or vore
Either kitchenette torture or weight scale torture
Either toilet flusher torture or breast torture
121.content:
After a long pause, during which Misery thought about all the possibilities available to her now. Looking from her room's kitchenette, to her in-room scale, to the bathroom with an immensely powerful toilet flusher, her mouth, down to her breasts, and further down to her feet, which she LOVES torturing the tiny people with!

Her justification in might seem illogical to anybody else, but she had a lot of pent up anger from listening to customers' complaints at work.

Dumping them on the bed, she decides...

choices: Vore
Foot torture

choices: grate one at a time on her teeth
readers choice
readers choice
12111.content: What interesting way should Misery vore them?
12111.title: Vore

choices: 128 Tiny man wins
118 Tiny girl wins
The weight is too much for the little people.
1212.content:
Misery looks toward the, white, metal scale and grins with a glimmer in her eye. She moves on the bed crawling on her knees as she looks down to her terrified group of tines and points to a small man with brown hair and light green jacket on.
"You how much do you think I weigh?" Misery asked curious of the small man's answer.

"W-what?! I-I don't know...1-126 pounds?" He guessed as he looked up at the giant purple haired goddess.

Mis smiles and chuckles slightly as she points to a blonde girl with a long pony tail and a blue blouse.

"What about you? How much do you think I weigh?" Misery asks again leaving the tinies confused.

The tiny girl looks around and begins to sweat not sure if the right answer would result in.

"U-um...116?" She asks nervously as Misery gets up off her knees and grabs the two tinies in question.

"Well since you two guessed so nice let's see who's closer." Misery said as she heads to the room's office desk and pulls out a roll of scotch tape. She moves the tiny man into her left hand with the girl and goes over to the scale and bends down. She lays both tinies where her feet would go and pulls on the tape as she looks down at them. The sound of the tape stretches out as she makes in longer than their bodies.

"Make sure not to move or try to escape if you make me mad you're gonna be in a world of pain." Misery told the two as she laid the tape on the midsection of the guy, pinning his arms to the ground making only his head and legs movable. She takes another piece of tape about equal size and pins the girl who was a bit more squirmy and made some air bubbles through her struggles.

"Hey I said no moving! I guess you get to go first." She said as she looks at the small blonde with excitement in her voice.

"W-what do you mean?" The girl asks frightfully. Suddenly her eyes shrink as a tall shadow invelopes the entire scale and the only thing she could see is the darkened Misery raising her bare naked foot up.

"Word of warning these feet smell REALLY bad so you might wanna hold your breath." Misery said before the girl could get the chance to inhale she quickly moves her sweaty foot onto the girl and on the scale making the little weigher spin around. Misery moves her hand on the wall as she extends her other foot to the small guy.

"Now it's your turn~" Misery said in an almost singing tune.

"W-wait don-" SLAM! Before the guy could finish her foot slammed right into him.

Misery loved feeling the two prisoners struggle as best they could against her large, sweaty, and smelly feet. Misery's eyes are closed as she wiggles her toes around moving the scent around. Her eyes opened as she looked towards the spinning scale.

"So let's see who was right..." She watched the scale as it started to stop at...
1212.title: Either kitchenette torture or weight scale torture

choices: Roxy gets bored and decides to eat them all!
Roxy makes them rub her feet under the punishment of getting eaten.
Roxy finishes them off between her feet and goes to see the other girls.
122.content:
Locking the door behind her, Roxy could feel her hands shaking. The rush of getting to play with one of the tinies at Misery's apartment before was a huge thrill to her. She had even taken a few home in secret to play with. They didn't last long though after Roxy found out she really enjoyed eating them up. Now she had another group of four and finally her own size remote to be able to shrink anyone on the ship she wanted.

Sinking down into her bed Roxy pulled the tiny people out of her jean shorts pocket in her soft hand. She felt them squirm but was too busy ignoring them as she pulled off her grimy sneakers. It felt good to get them off and press her bare soles to the cool white sheets of her cabins bed.

Without much care for them, Roxy dumped her handfull out onto the bed. She still really didn't see them as people, but moreso as something to have fun with. They stared up in horror as the giant girls sweaty feet positioned themselves to bare down upon the tiny people.

The group under the shadow of Roxy's left foot cringed as they saw their other two companions get stepped on by the giant punk girls right foot. A moment of silence followed as the reddish pink haired girl smiled down at her foot. The sound of seagulls and the calm rush of the ocean outside were all that could be heard in the cabin.

In a sudden burst of movement, Roxy's right foot rose from the other two sending them flying into the air after being stuck briefly to the girls foot by the moisture on her skin. They cartwheeled in the air and landed lightly back down on the bed.

Without a second thought the two tinies that had just witnessed this realized that Roxy's left foot was about to fall upon them. They dove away but one only succeeded in getting grabbed by her toes and drug back under the ball of her foot as she scrunched her toes over and over, shoving him back where she wanted him.

It was a group of two girls and two guys at the giant punk girls feet. They seemed to be in their fourties and fairly well dressed. Maybe Amanda had grabbed them when they were out for lunch downtown. They seemed like business people. Roxy didn't care much, she just thought it was funny that the one woman had lost her heels and now was kneeling in her stockings staring up in shock at the vicious step she'd just endured.

They all looked worse for wear with torn suits and dishelved hair. There was no escape from this gigantic girl. All they could do was hope that she'd come to her senses. However, Roxy was having too much fun for that.

The pressure under her foot was pretty great, holding the tiny people down against the cool sheets of the bed under the radiating heat of her bare sole. The soft skin felt surprisingly good, but the thrill ended there when they realized they were being stepped on by a girl who could easily finish them off under just her feet.
122.title: Roxy's POV As She Introduces The Tinies to ...

choices: yes
no

"You're small forever now!! Your only hope is to rub my feet!!" Well, Roxy at least told the tinies what they had to do.

However, Jeff, who was one of them, was curious as to what would happen if they didn't rub. "What if we choose not to?"

Roxy smiled, and said "Well then I'll end your miserable lives by eating you!"

Should the tinies rub?
1222.title: Roxy makes them rub her feet under the punishme...

choices: One of them triggers a pleasurable reflex, causing Roxy to scrunch her toes down
There's a knock at her cabin door
12221.content:
Many of the tinies start crying. This was supposed to be a relaxing cruise for them, and now it has turned to a deadly ultimatum! One man decides to take the initiative, and begins walking forward. The other tinies reach to try to pull him back, wanting to reach a consensus, but he's too far.

Walking up to the immense sole, he begins massaging it.

Roxy stretches back on the bed, "mmm, that's GOOD!" Her dirty, smelly toes splay, making the other tinies smell the awful odor even stronger. "Come on, you bugs, there's no way your pathetic lives can get any better, so you might as well help me enjoy MY cruise even more!"

Out of fear, not willingness, they all come and start rubbing her foot too.

What happens next?
12221.title: yes

choices: Amanda continues to play with her captives
Amanda takes Mindy on a terrifying tour of the ship
Amanda calls Misery over, to "play" with their tinies together
123.content:
Amanda regarded her small suite quietly. It was all she could reasonably expect from a single-occupancy cabin without paying more exorbitant rates; it was about six feet across, with a bed on one side, built-in desk on the other, a sink, and small bathroom. Perfectly serviceable for a week's stay, and more than adequate for the task at hand. That task, of course, being revenge.

She slid her luggage under her bed; there'd be time to unpack later. She took the time to remove a single small wooded box, which she placed calmly on her desk. Removing her socks and shoes, she sat in the chair, and opened the box. Inside the felt-lined container were six tiny people, each one inch tall. They were all young women, dressed in a matching assortment of short skirts and shirts festooned with a school logo. As she loomed over her terrified captives, sunlight gleaming off of her glasses, Amanda gave a smile that could chill the dead.

She'd given Misery and Roxy whatever poor souls she'd had lying around, for their own amusement. But these...no, these were special. These women had taunted and teased Amanda for longer than she cared to remember. They'd made her life in school a living hell. If Amanda didn't already harbor deep misanthropic tendencies, the abuse she suffered at this cheer team's hands would surely have been enough to inspire some within her. She'd denied herself proper justice on these preening witches for some time, telling herself that she had to space out her fun with the tinies she truly hated, lest she run out of them too soon. Like a fine wine, she needed to savor them for special events.

What better occasion than a vacation to indulge in some overdue payback?

"Hey there, Mindy," Amanda whispered, knowing it would still be very loud to her prisoners. "Girls. What's up?"

Mindy was the head cheerleader, although Amanda had to admit she didn't know the names of the others. It was Mindy who singled Amanda out, Mindy who'd constantly ridiculed and assaulted her. The others were complicit, but Mindy was most guilty in Amanda's eyes.

Mindy, a strawberry blond with a perfect, if minimized, body, stared up at the comparative giantess with terror, and even a little confusion. "I...Amanda? What happened? You...you have to help us!" From the poor girl's perspective, this was too much to take in. The team had been meeting for a regular summer training session yesterday morning, when there had been this disorienting, blinding light. When it cleared, the six of them were in this dark, impenetrable box. And now, freed after who knows how long, everything around them looked enormous.

"Do I really have to do anything?" Amanda hissed. "You're not in any position to make demands! School's out, and I'm calling the shots, now."

Mindy took a moment to digest this. What...what was going on? "You...did you do this to us? Turn us back right now, or I'll...I'll call the police!"

"Hm, yeah. No. No, I don't think you will," Amanda chided, eyes lighting up with malicious glee as she watched the ramifications of their position sink into her captive's faces. "Your adorable matching iPhones are far too tiny to transmit or receive a signal. You can't get off of this table at your size, or leave the room. And if you did...well, you don't even know where you are. Quite simply, my pretties, I'm your God, now. Will I be a merciful, loving God?"

Her smile turned absolutely terrifying, as her eyes were lost entirely by the sunlight on her glasses. "Well. What do you think?"

If Mindy had been able to eat anything in the last twelve hours, she'd be vomiting in terror. As it was, she was already pale as a sheet, and her knees were just about as sturdy.

"But...but why?" she managed.

"Oh, like you really have to ask," Amanda snapped. She slammed her fist on the desk, which sent all six of her prisoners toppling over with the force of the impact. She'd had enough preening over her victory. Time to play. She'd save Mindy for last, but she needed to make an example of one, right now. Lifting her fist off of the desk, she hovered her hand over them, licking her lips in anticipation. As her face flushed slightly, her free hand slid under the desk, to her lap. She pulled back the elastic strap of her skirt, along with her panties.

"Eenie, meanie, miney, mo," Amanda teased in sing-song voice. "Who will be the first to go?"

Without waiting for an answer from her cowering captives, she suddenly grabbed a girl, gripping the screaming young woman firmly between her thumb and index finger. Retracting the hand, she released the girl in mid-air.

To those on the desk, crying out in horror, it looked as if Amanda had just dropped the girl to her death. But then they heard the telltale elastic snap as Amanda's skirt went back into place. The demented purr of satisfaction Amanda gave as her eyes fluttered slightly confirmed the terrifying truth.

"Oh, she's a fighter, that one," Amanda breathed, squirming slightly in her seat. "So. Who's next?"
123.title: Vengence is Mine, Sayeth Amanda

choices: "I want to see them at your feet."
"Let's put the rest of them to work, like little Jodi."
Amanda doesn't speak, instead making a pass at Misery
1233.content:
Amanda was riding fairly high at this point. Not only did she have one of her tiny slaves stimulating her as if her life depended on it, (which, really, it completely did), but she had five more tinies to play with, including one of her most hated enemies. The combination of sadistic power lust, physical pleasure, and intellectual thrill of knowing that it was her own technology that made it all possible...the blond mad scientist was practically in bliss. She briefly paused to wonder if it could possibly get any better?

Well, now that she thought about it...

She reached idly for her cell phone, her hand passing over where the reduced members of the cheer squad cowered in absolute mortal terror, convinced she was reaching for another of them. All things considered, this was a prudent assumption on their part, although incorrect in this exact instance. None of them wanted to follow their unfortunate comrade into Amanda's undergarments; the demented giantess's occasional small moans of satisfaction were a constant reminder of the poor girl's fate.

Ignoring her prisoners for now, Amanda sent a quick text message to Misery, only one cabin over from her.

'Are you busy?'

She waited a few moments, until the reply came.

'I was about to start playing with my tinies. What do you want?'

'Ignore them. Come to my cabin. I've got something to show you.'

'K.'

A moment later, Amanda stood on (not surprisingly) shaky legs to answer the door, allowing the purple-haired goth inside. Misery was actually a bit annoyed at her planned games being interrupted, but Amanda hadn't steered her wrong before. Quite the contrary; she'd always been well-served by participating in the blond's experiments.

"So, what's up?" she asked casually, not immediately noticing the oddly distracted look on Amanda's face, or the blush in her cheeks.

"I've got someone special for us, Misery," Amanda announced proudly, leading her test-subject to the small desk. Misery's eyes lit up in recognition when she saw the shrunken cheer squad.

"Is that...Mindy?"

"And her cronies, yes," Amanda noted. "Right where they belong. At our mercy."

At the sight of the towering gothzilla before her, Mindy decided to take a chance and beg for help. She doubted Misery would aid her; she barely knew the girl, but the two hadn't really gotten along in their few interactions. And if she was Amanda's partner in this madness, that boded even worse for her chances.

But, hell, it couldn't possibly make things any worse.

"Misery!" she shrieked, sounding more like a "squeak" than a proper "shriek" at her scale. "She's insane! A pervert! She dropped Jodi in her panties! It's sick!"

Misery raised an eyebrow, regarding her partner in crime. "You dropped one of them in your-"

Amanda's blush intensified. "Oh, like you're one to judge," she noted, eyes darting to the side for a moment.

"And she's still there?"

Amanda nodded, smiling slightly. "She's a fighter," she noted with satisfaction.

"...you're kind of messed up, you know?" Misery said, completely serious. After a moment, her expression broke, and she started laughing. Mindy's heart sank upon hearing this; it provided confirmation that the goth girl wasn't going to be sympathetic to their plight.

"So, what should we do with the rest of 'em?" Misery asked, eying the girls on the table with a predatory glint in her eye.

Amanda already had her answer ready.
1233.title: Indiscretions

choices: That they have to go to a VIP hotel they have further down the coast
An upgrade to a suite. but they need more money so how,..somebody shrinks!
They brought a tent for the beach just in case of this...(Party Time!)
writer's choice
13.content:
"Hey I know about this resort by the coast that we all can get into" Roxy tells the crew about how they have the best masseuses, and some of the finest chef's in the world working there 24/7, I got enough money saved for it,so does anyone care to join me? "hell yea" the girls reply, I'm need to get ready first though, Misery tells them as she walks out of the restaurant and gets in her sedan to go back to the house and freshen up a little.

          The other two girls joke around with each other and finish their meals,"I think I'm going to pop girl that was really good eating" Amanda says to Roxy while rubbing her bloated belly" yea, I wish they served those little people we keep finding here at the restaurant,then we wouldn't have to chase them down," Roxy replies with a sudden belch"oops excuse me Amanda,"she said "nah your alright girl,I don't give a damn about what other people think of us,we ain't here to Impress these people"Roxy say's in a defiant manner that surprises even Amanda. "Well OK then, Lets go hook up with Misery back at her crib and see if she's ready yet."

         Roxy and Amanda arrive at the house ready to get on with trip,upon opening up Misery's apartment they see that the house is overrun with little people of all various types of weight and sex."Come on girls, I need your help getting rid of these pests, kill them!" With sudden fury, the sexy and voluptuous, purple haired Misery began another relentless campaign of squishing people into her hardwood floors, killing off a few dozen more.

         "Well we might as well join in or Misery will never be able to leave with us to check in the hotel on time,by my calculations from one square meter of the apartment, their are approximately 2 to 3 hundred of them,she will need help," Amanda tells Roxi in her in her usual smart, and elegant manner."Two two three hundred! I'm already so full from the restaurant,I'll do my best Amanda."

         The trio commence to going to town whith their relentless assault on the entrapped guest's in the apartment,Squishing and eating up all of them but a few that remained as snacks for the trip to the resort."Here put them in this sac" Misery says while looking at the last one she could wrangle up from beneath her bed

"Come on girls, lets get going" Misery says stuffing the tied squirming bag of people in her travel pack and beginning the trip to the resort.

As they enter in the resort, the lady at the checkout booth tells them the room they want is already occupied and suggests,....
13.title: Amanda takes them to a tropical resort.

info.brief_description: Misery, Roxy and Amanda go on a summer vacation with shrunken people!
info.description:
Misery - Purple haired goth girl who is typically sleepy and because of this, pretty irrational with her ideas of how to handle the shrunken people. She usually prefers stepping on them. Misery wears a lot of cargo pants and dark colored tee shirts, but she occasionally wears girlier clothes too.

Roxy - Still surprised by how tiny the people Amanda has are, Roxy doesn't really see them as real people. She really enjoys eating them. Roxy is a punk girl who is easy going and tends to wear ripped jean shorts and tank tops.

Amanda - The young scientist who shrunk many of their fellow classmates as test subjects. She is agressive, angry and doesn't care about who she hurts. To Amanda, everything is about testing out the size changing capabilities of her remote control.

NOTE: We will not steal your ideas. We already have all our future stories planned out. By contributing to this interactive you agknowledge any similar ideas in FantaSize are purely coincidental.

Please keep characters all 18+. We reserve the right to edit contributions that do not comply to this rule.
